accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia, Dean of the Curry School of Education, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-10/1/1.861, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from Richard M. Brandt, Curry School of Education, University of Virginia on November 1, 1986.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of general records of the Office of the Dean of the Curry School of Education during the tenure of Richard M. Brandt.

Topics include AACTE (American Association of Colleges for Teacher Education), Association of Colleges and Schools of Education in State Universities and Land Grant Colleges (ACSESULGC), administrative committees, American Educational Research Association, alumni, annual reports, budget, Bureau of Education Researchs, continuing education, Education Day, fifth year program, minority affairs, reorganization, retreats, special education, State Council of Higher Education in Virginia, summer session, Virginia Association of College for Teacher Education (VACTE), faculty and personnel, off-ground programs, and general correspondence.
